a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Median and mean income (after tax), United States, 1963 to
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries. Income here is measured after taxes
Note: This data is measured in international-$ at 2017 prices. Income has been equivalized.
